job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Job Tittle:- </strong>Site Reliability Engineer</p><p><strong>Job Location:- </strong>Alpharetta, GA<strong>.</strong></p><p><strong>Job Type: Long term&nbsp;Contract </strong></p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;Responsibilities: </p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;• Run the production environment by monitoring availability and taking a holistic view of system health</p><p> • Manage platform infrastructure and applications</p><p> • Improve reliability, quality, and time-to-market of our suite of software solutions</p><p> • Measure and optimize system performance.</p><p> • Provide primary operational support and engineering for multiple large distributed software applications</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;Requirements: </p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;• Deploy software artifacts to Development, QA, Integration, UAT, Staging, Load and Production environments</p><p> • Configure and troubleshoot software runtime environment, provide development support and Incident support</p><p> • Lead the rollout, enforcement and continuous improvement of team and enterprise standards</p><p> • Configuring Continuous Integration and/or Continuous Delivery pipelines</p><p> • Use continuous Integration tools: Jenkins, Sonar, Ant, Maven, Nexus, Rundeck, CHEF, Sonar</p><p> • Use of code repository tools like GIT</p><p> • Contribute to the design and implementation of our configuration management software architecture</p><p> • Design and implementation of tools to streamline SCM, Integration and QA processes</p><p> • Define, implement and champion policies to significantly increase the efficiency of our software development/delivery process</p><p> • Ensure Continuous Integration and Delivery through SDLC. Work with Development, QA and Operations to guarantee prompt, accurate, and repeatable delivery of the builds</p><p> • Provide up-to-date and accurate documentation on the SCM environment and Process Automation tools</p><p> • Work closely with Development and Quality Engineering teams</p><p> • Experience in one of the clouds (Azure/GCP/AWS).</p><p> • Experience in Java based application deployment on application servers like WebSphere and tomcat.</p><p> • Experience I vulnerability management and applying software patches</p><p> • UAT/Production deployments</p><p> • Experience with Agile practices § Good team player and coordination skills</p><p> • Candidate should be a Green Card Holder or a US Citizen</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Regards&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Kajal&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>IT Recruiter&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>+1.307-316-7195 |Kajalsaini@noralogic.com|www.noralogic.com&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Noralogic&nbsp;| 109 E 17th&nbsp;St, Cheyenne WY 82001&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>USA: WY, MD, NJ&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Mexico: Guadalajara, Monterrey&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>India: Noida UP&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>**WBE and MBE company**&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>** ISO 9001:2015**&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>**WY Top 50 Minority owned growing company**&nbsp;</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
